setup_key1: Tell them to create a JS file and add a <script> tag in the html page.
setup_key2: Here we should tell them to add some basic thing like console.log(""Rishabh Verma"").
setup_key3: Teach them how to open Chrome Dev Tools. At the end they should see their console output in the chrome dev tools easily.
setup_key4: This video explains the concept of including JS into the page really really well.
